casebody.data:
King DAVID and William Talmadge SPEARS, Appellants, v. George A. SUTTON, Executor of the Estate of Mansfield L. Spears, Deceased, et al., Appellees. No. 10626. United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit. Oct. 19, 1948. I. H. Spears, of Pasadena, Cal., for appellants. George A. Sutton, of Pontiac, Mich., for appellees.

Before ALLEN, MARTIN, and McALLISTER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This case came on to be heard upon the briefs and record and oral argument of counsel. And it appearing that no reversible error exists in the record, it is ordered that the judgment of the District Court be, and it hereby is, affirmed.
